name: biomni-read-function-source-code
title: Biomni: Read Function Source Code
description: Read the source code of a function from any module path. Provide the fully qualified function name (e.g., 'biomni.tool.support_tools.run_python_repl').
content:
Overview

This utility tool reads and returns the source code of any function from specified module paths. It provides introspection capabilities for examining function implementations, useful for understanding tool behavior and debugging workflows.

Input Parameters

  • function_name (required): Fully qualified function name including module path (e.g., 'biomni.tool.support_tools.run_python_repl' or 'numpy.mean')

Input Format

{
  "function_name": "biomni.tool.support_tools.run_python_repl"
}

Biological Use Case

Understanding the implementation details of bioinformatics tools and functions is crucial for:

  • Verifying algorithms used in genomic data analysis pipelines
  • Debugging unexpected results in complex analysis workflows
  • Understanding parameter handling and data transformations
  • Reviewing statistical methods applied to expression data
  • Inspecting preprocessing steps in variant calling pipelines
  • Documenting analysis methodology for reproducibility

Output

Generates a text file (source_code.txt) containing the complete source code of the specified function, including docstrings, function signature, and implementation details.

Category

support_tools
command: rm -rf prod_apps 2>/dev/null || true && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps && python3 prod_apps/biomni/support_tools/read_function_source_code.py "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}"
